base_prompt_suffix: stylized fantasy art style for a top-down RPG. The art style is graphic and stylized, like a living memory, slightly desaturated and dream-like. The asset should have clean lines. It should be easily recognizable at small sizes.

style_modifiers.global: grapohic, stylized, clean lines, fantasy art, top-down perspective
style_modifiers.icon: all black background, centered, clear silhouette, high contrast
style_modifiers.sprite: dynamic pose, expressive, all black background, consistent lighting from top-left
style_modifiers.texture: seamless, tileable, repeating pattern, uniform lighting

negative_prompt: photorealistic, 3d render, blurry, noisy, text, watermark, signature, ugly, deformed
